alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 10:36PM EDT until May 10 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. .Recent rainfall has led to rises on area rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River near Linn Grove. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The flooding of county roads begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 PM EDT Sunday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 5.9 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
